display_long_description:
Dive into a pulse-pounding virtual reality arcade shooter experience that pushes the boundaries of immersion and intensity. Deagle Jack plunges you into a relentless battle for survival against increasingly dangerous hordes of zombies, monstrous creatures, and sinister entities, all determined to overwhelm you.

Equipped with your trusty Desert Eagle pistol, battle through increasingly challenging hordes of zombies and monstrous creatures, each more deadly than the last. Navigate through eerie environments enveloped in mysterious fog, signaling escalating threats as you progress. 

Game Features:

Addictive Gameplay: Deagle Jack delivers an intensely satisfying VR experience designed for maximum excitement

Progressive Difficulty: Survive through 20 escalating hordes featuring unique enemy types and increased enemy counts.

Boss Battles: Confront epic bosses at the end of each major stage
Weapon Upgrades & Power-Ups: Collect powerful bonuses and strategically enhance your Desert Eagle:

Competitive Highscore Leaderboard: Prove your dominance by climbing the ranks on a global online leaderboard, competing with players worldwide to secure your reputation as the ultimate VR survivor.

Cutting-Edge VR Graphics: Deagle Jack utilizes the revolutionary "Oniri" rendering system to deliver unmatched visual realism and atmospheric immersion on Quest, creating environments that blur the line between virtuality and reality.

Perfect for introducing VR to first-time users and leaving them
